Package es.uam.eps.ir.relison.links.data.letor

Class FeatureInformation

java.lang.Object
es.uam.eps.ir.relison.links.data.letor.FeatureInformation
public class FeatureInformation
extends java.lang.Object
Class for storing some information about the features for ML patterns.
Author:
Javier Sanz-Cruzado (javier.sanz-cruzado@uam.es), Pablo Castells (pablo.castells@uam.es), Craig Macdonald (craig.macdonald@glasgow.ac.uk), Iadh Ounis (iadh.ounis@glasgow.ac.uk)
